description.english: Find the resting place of Mr Jones
description.german: Find den letzten Ruheplaz von Herrn Hones
description.french: Trouver la dernière demeure de M. Jones
description.italian: Trova la tomba del signor Jones
description.spanish: Encuentra el lugar de descanso del Señor Jones.
description.schinese: 找到琼斯先生的歇息之地
description.japanese: ジョーンズさんのお墓を見つける

displayName.french: Sur le fil de la lame

description.english: Completed 'Graveyard Depths' without slowing down the blades
description.german: Spiele durch "Graveyard Depths" ohne fuer die Klingen zu stoppen
description.french: Terminer le niveau des Entrailles de la crypte sans ralentir les lames
description.italian: Hai completato il livello "Fosse profonde" senza rallentare le lame
description.spanish: Has completado «Profundidades del cementerio» sin ralentizar las cuchillas.
description.schinese: 在不减缓速度的情况下完成“墓地深处”
description.japanese: ブレードのスピードを緩めずに｢深層の墓場｣を完了

description.english: Make it across the Trap Door Puzzle in under 7 seconds in 'It Burns'
description.german: Durchquere das Falltuer Puzzle in "It Burns" in unter 7 Sekunden
description.french: Traverser la trappe en moins de 7 secondes dans le niveau Ça brûle
description.italian: Nel livello "Brucia" supera il rompicapo della botola in meno di 7 secondi
description.spanish: Supera el puzle Puerta Trampa en menos de 7 segundos en «Quema».
description.schinese: 在 3 秒内完成“燃烧”中的陷阱门拼图
description.russian: Пройдите ловушку с дверью за 7 секунды на уровне "Оно жжется"
description.japanese: トラップドアの謎を3秒以下で解かないと｢炎上｣します

description.english: Cause 50 evil skulls to fall to their death
description.german: Zwinge 50 boese Schaedel dazu zu ihrem Tod zu fallen
description.french: Pousser 50 crânes maléfiques vers une chute mortelle
description.italian: Provoca la caduta a morte di 50 teschi malvagi
description.spanish: Haz que 50 cráneos maléficos caigan y mueran.
description.schinese: 造成 50 个邪恶骷髅坠落而亡
description.japanese: 50個の邪悪な頭蓋骨により死に至らしめられる

displayName.french: Le plus important, c'est la chute

description.english: Fall at least 10 kilometres over any number of playthroughs
description.german: Falle mindestesn 10 Kilometer ueber eine beliebige Anzahl an Playthroughs.
description.french: Cumuler au moins 10 kilomètres de chute
description.italian: Precipita per almeno un totale di 10 chilometri con tutte le partite che vuoi
description.spanish: Cae al menos 10 kilómetros a lo largo de cualquier número de partidas.
description.schinese: 许多个通关之后，至少下降 10 千米
description.russian: Упадите как минимум на 10 километров за любое количество прохождений
description.japanese: 総合して少なくとも10キロメートルは下降する

description.english: Finish 'Loot the Temple' the quick way.
description.german: Spiel durch "Loot the Temple" auf dem schnellen Weg.
description.french: Terminer rapidement le niveau Temple à sac
description.italian: Completa "Saccheggia il tempio" nel modo rapido.
description.spanish: Acaba «Saquea el templo» de la manera rápida.
description.schinese: 以最快捷的方式完成“洗劫神庙”。
description.japanese: ｢寺院での略奪｣を最短で終わらせる

description.english: Finished all Levels with Gold Banner
description.german: Beende alle Levels mit einer goldenen Fahne
description.french: Obtenez un drapeau doré pour chaque niveau
description.italian: Hai completato tutti i livelli con il Vessillo Dorato
description.spanish: Finalizados todos los niveles con Estandarte dorado.
description.schinese: 用黄金旗完成所有关卡
description.russian: Пройдите все уровни с золотым знаменем
description.japanese: 全てのレベルを金旗で完了

description.english: Complete all levels in under 80 minutes
description.german: Spiele durch alle Levels in weniger als 80 Minuten.
description.french: Terminer tous les niveaux en moins de 80 minutes
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli in meno di 80 minuti
description.spanish: Completa todos los niveles en menos de 80 minutos.
description.schinese: 在 80 分钟内完成所有关卡
description.japanese: 全てのレベルを80分以下で完了

description.german: Besiege alle Levels ohne zu Sterben
description.french: Terminer tous les niveaux sans mourir
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli senza morire
description.spanish: Completa todos los niveles sin morir.
description.schinese: 在不死的情况下完成所有关卡
description.japanese: 一度も死なずに全てのレベルを完了

description.spanish: Lánzate desde la copa del árbol.
description.japanese: 木の天辺から投げ飛ばされる
